channel.title: Forget About Freeman - crash during loading
channel.description:
Hi guys. I have some problems with this chapter.
I'm here
[img]https://cloud-4.steampowered.com/ugc/544139766653372010/BDF0356CE3747B707AB793DF00CB31A8F69034EC/[/img]
and i'm trying to get here, up this ladder
[img]https://cloud-4.steampowered.com/ugc/544139766653374469/83E15C3BC695BE85E002B9854D255952EDFAE1C2/[/img]
[img]https://cloud-4.steampowered.com/ugc/544139766653376342/FAD7229E52BD4A0144C6065DC549852B34A99AA7/[/img]
but then, loading screen shows up and nothing else happens. Game is frozen :/ any tips?
